credit_line: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
title: The Beach
description: Design shows scenes at the beach, including lifeguard lifting weights, people buried in the sand, couples under umbrellas and people sunbathing. Printed in tan, pink, yellow and black on gray-spotted white ground.
